CVNext Lab

The Zhejiang University-University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Institute

The CVNext lab focuses on cutting-edge research in computer vision. The research directions include motion and sequential modeling, pose estimation and tracking, generative models, and knowledge transfer.

Professor


Gaoang Wang [Web]

Assistant Professor

Office: C417, ZJUI Building
Email: gaoangwang@intl.zju.edu.cn

Research Interests:

  • Computer Vision
  • Machine Learning / Deep Learning
  • Motion Modeling
  • Generative Models
  • Knowledge Transfer
